summary: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.
cast: Jack Black|Dustin Hoffman|Angelina Jolie|Ian McShane|Jackie Chan|Seth Rogen|Lucy Liu|David Cross|Randall Duk Kim|James Hong|Dan Fogler|Michael Clarke Duncan|Wayne Knight|Kyle Gass|JR Reed|Laura Kightlinger|Tanya Haden|Stephen Kearin|Mark Osborne|John Stevenson|Jeremy Shipp|Melissa Cobb|Kent Osborne|Emily Burns|Stephanie Harvey|Riley Osborne|Kresimir Mikic
title: Kung Fu Panda
